current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Partial skeletal parts only
case_address_found_1: 2.3 miles east of the intersection of Amboy Rd and Iron Age rd; 125 feet north of Iron Age Rd
case_circumstances: John Doe #10-81 is a White male adult, between 30-50 years of age, 5'8" to 6', with light-brown hair and a robust build.  His skeletal remains were found in and around a shallow grave in the open desert.  Identity may only be established with dental X-rays (see attached) and DNA (refer to CODIS #BK-04-000736).
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
